scripts.preinstall: npm install babel-cli@latest gulp-cli@latest webpack@latest webpack-dev-server@latest watch@latest mjml@latest veon@latest browser-sync@latest --global
scripts.deploy: veon set production "gulp clean && gulp && babel detail-list.js --out-file detail-list.support.js --source-maps && webpack --progress"
scripts.build: veon set development "gulp clean && gulp && babel detail-list.js --out-file detail-list.support.js --source-maps && webpack --progress"
scripts.test: veon set test "gulp && webpack --progress --env.test && mjml test-index.mjml --output test-index.html"
